page.title: 12ART AND DESIGN IN EPSOM
page.content: {There has been an art school in Epsom {since 1886.}The new school of art and design was completed in 1972. This includes a 3-storey block with lecture and seminar rooms, full print facilities, computer aided design, photo/multi-purpose hall, and the school administrative block. There is also single-storey workshop accomodation. The first stage of study is planned to inform, develop and confirm the students' choice in 1 of 2 main study options and includes: fashion design studies and illustrations, clothing technology, culture illustrations and studies, professional practice studies, computer aided design. The 2nd stage is to introduce the student to the principal study option or other options. The 3rd enables specialisation in the chosen subject.
